@package glados
@version 0.1.0.0

module Types
data Expr
Number :: Integer -> Expr
FloatLiteral :: Double -> Expr
Boolean :: Bool -> Expr
Symbol :: String -> Expr
String :: String -> Expr
List :: [Expr] -> Expr
data IAST
IANumber :: Integer -> IAST
IAFloatLiteral :: Double -> IAST
IABoolean :: Bool -> IAST
IASymbol :: String -> IAST
IAString :: String -> IAST
IAList :: [IAST] -> IAST
IAIf :: IAST -> IAST -> IAST -> IAST
IALambda :: [String] -> IAST -> IAST
IADefine :: String -> IAST -> IAST
IAQuote :: IAST -> IAST
IAInfix :: IAST -> String -> IAST -> IAST
IACall :: String -> [IAST] -> IAST
IAFunctionDef :: String -> [(String, Maybe CladType)] -> Maybe CladType -> [IAST] -> IAST
IAMain :: [IAST] -> IAST
IADeclare :: String -> Maybe CladType -> IAST -> IAST
IAAssign :: String -> IAST -> IAST
IAReturn :: IAST -> IAST
IAConditional :: IAST -> [IAST] -> Maybe [IAST] -> IAST
IAWhile :: IAST -> [IAST] -> IAST
IAFor :: IAST -> IAST -> IAST -> [IAST] -> IAST
IAProgram :: [IAST] -> IAST
IAUnit :: IAST
data CladType
IntT :: CladType
FloatT :: CladType
BoolT :: CladType
StringT :: CladType
VoidT :: CladType
ListT :: CladType -> CladType
data Value
IntVal :: Integer -> Value
FloatVal :: Double -> Value
BoolVal :: Bool -> Value
FuncVal :: [String] -> IAST -> Env -> Value
Primitive :: ([Value] -> Either String Value) -> Value
ListVal :: [Value] -> Value
SymbolVal :: String -> Value
StringVal :: String -> Value
Void :: Value
type Env = [(String, Value)]
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Types.CladType
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Types.Expr
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Types.IAST
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Types.Value
instance GHC.Internal.Show.Show Types.CladType
instance GHC.Internal.Show.Show Types.Expr
instance GHC.Internal.Show.Show Types.IAST
instance GHC.Internal.Show.Show Types.Value

module TranslateAST
translateExpr :: Expr -> Either String IAST

module TailCallOptimization
data Bounce
Done :: Either String Value -> Bounce
Call :: (Env -> IO Bounce) -> Env -> Bounce
runTrampoline :: Bounce -> IO (Either String Value)

module ParseValue
parseValue :: [Expr] -> IO (Either String ())
evalValue :: IAST -> Env -> IO Bounce
showValue :: Value -> String
builtins :: Env
runExprs :: Env -> [Expr] -> IO (Either String Env)
primAdd :: [Value] -> Either String Value
primSub :: [Value] -> Either String Value
primMul :: [Value] -> Either String Value
primDiv :: [Value] -> Either String Value
primMod :: [Value] -> Either String Value
primLt :: [Value] -> Either String Value
primEq :: [Value] -> Either String Value
primCons :: [Value] -> Either String Value
primCar :: [Value] -> Either String Value
primCdr :: [Value] -> Either String Value
primList :: [Value] -> Either String Value
primNull :: [Value] -> Either String Value

module ParseToExpr
parseExpr :: Parser Expr
parseProgram :: Parser [Expr]

module ParseArguments
parseContent :: [String] -> IO (Either String ())
parseArgs :: [String] -> IO (Either String String)
handleInput :: String -> IO (Either String String)
getCladExtension :: String -> Bool
debugParse :: String -> IO (Either String ())

module CladLexer
type Parser = Parsec Void String
sc :: Parser ()
lexeme :: Parser a -> Parser a
symbol :: String -> Parser String
parseIdentifier :: Parser String
parseNumber :: Parser IAST
parseFloat :: Parser IAST
parseBoolean :: Parser IAST
parseString :: Parser IAST
parseOperator :: Parser String

module CladParser
parseProgramAST :: Parser IAST
parseInstruction :: Parser IAST
parseExpression :: Parser IAST

module ParseToAST
parseAST :: String -> Either (ParseErrorBundle String Void) IAST
